section.title: Introduction
section.p: Welcome to Go - the Continuous Integration and Release Management system from ThoughtWorks Studios. Please take a minute to understand the basic concepts in Go before you go any further.

section.title: Quick help
section.p: Need help fast? Try out the topics below to get building in no time.

bullets.item: System requirements - Find out system requirements before you install Go.
Installing Go - Learn how to install Go.
Upgrading Go - Upgrade Go from an older version.

subsection.title: Getting started
subsection.p: Installation done but need help setting up Go?

bullets.item: Set up your first pipeline - Go captures the build plan for your project in a pipeline. Find out how to set up your first pipeline.
Install agents - You need a build agent in order to start building. Learn to deploy one or more agents here.
Concepts in Go - Review basic concepts in Go. Understand how Go sees the world.
Managing pipelines - Release Management with Go.
Managing a build cloud - How to set up and scale your build cloud.
Managing artifacts and reports - Keep your test reports, binaries and other artifacts in Go's central repository.
